authors.author: Judson Van DeVenter Winfield S. Weeden

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Sunlight, sunlight
in my soul today!
Sunlight, sunlight
all along the way;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Since the Savior found me
Took away my sin,
I have had the sunlight of His love within.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I wandered in the shades of night,
Till Jesus came to me,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And with the sunlight
of His love
Bid all my darkness flee.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Tho' clouds may gather
in the sky,
And billows
round me roll,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
However dark
the world may be,
I've sunlight in my soul.

verse.name: v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
O press
with holy vigor on,
And leave the world behind.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
I cross
the wide-extended fields,
I journey o'er the plain,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
And in the sunlight
of His love
I reap the golden grain.

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Soon I shall see Him
as He is,
The light
that came to me,

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
Behold the brightness
of His face,
Thro'out eternity.
